Title: Neko Funjatta
Description: ['A song for the ', Minna no Uta, ' segment, it adapts "Flohwalzer" (Flea Waltz) is a simple German piano piece, often one of the first learned because its fingering is simple and it allows beginners to perform a piece that is harmonically and rhythmically pleasing. It has different names in different countries but in Japan this piece is known as ', Neko Funjatta, ' (I Stepped on the Cat).', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' (Source: Wiki)']
